author: Robert Mammone
description:
There is a breed of fantasy writer who, no matter how talented, haven’t received the attention they, and by extension their work, deserve.  Writers like Paul Kearney, whose Monarchies of God series should’ve thrust him higher in the consciousness of fantasy writers, is one such author.  Another is Michael Woodring Stover, whose Caine books, a […]

The post REVIEW: Old Gods and Other Tales by Scott Oden appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Old Gods and Other Tales by Scott Oden
